https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/58b4K6hWkfeTLRrIrripkKzMUd9.jpg Filmed over 5 years, A Syrian Love Story charts an incredible odyssey to political freedom. For Raghda and Amer, it is a journey of hope, dreams and despair: for the revolution, their homeland and each other. A Syrian Love Story
